quote: She measured time in pages. Half an hour, to her, meant ten pages read, or fourteen, depending on the size of the type, and when you think of time in this way there isnâ€™t time for anything else.
quote_letters: SHE MEASURED TIME IN PAGES HALF AN HOUR TO HER MEANT TEN PAGES READ OR FOURTEEN DEPENDING ON THE SIZE OF THE TYPE AND WHEN YOU THINK OF TIME IN THIS WAY THERE ISNT TIME FOR ANYTHING ELSE
